comments:
Description:
IllegalStateException when click in Dataset dialog in attached report

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached report in bug #137415
2. Double click DataSet2
3. Click Parameter->Computed Columns->Output Columns->Query in order

Expected result:
No errors.

Actual result:
